text: Kasnampa vahekamo'zama avanagnaza ke'none hu'zama huama'ma hu'nazana, havige hu'za kagrira regavatga hu'naze. Hagi kagrama hu'nana kumira erinte amara hu'za kasamizagenka nentahinka, ana kumimofo kinafintira atrenka fru hunka omani'nane. Anumzamofontegati eri'nona kasnampa ke hu'zama kagri'ma kasami'nazana havige hu'za kavre'za havi kampi vu'naze.
